Items.Name: Lightning Rod
Items.Effect: Target up to 3 Overt Threats: Deal 3 damage to the first, 2 to the second, and 1 to the third

Items.Name: Choas Orb
Items.Effect: Draw an invention from any stack it counts as you have this invention this turn

Items.Name: Magic Missle Launcher
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage divided as you choose to Overt Threats

Items.Name: Death Ray
Items.Effect: Deal 6 damage to a Biological Threat

Items.Name: Magic Draining Beam
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to a Magical Threat and an additional 2 if it is Overt

Items.Name: Magic Harvester
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage to a Magical Threat and if it was killed this way, gain 1 [^Magic]

Items.Name: Anti Magic Field
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to all Magical Threats

Items.Name: Chaos Cannon
Items.Effect: Deal 1d6 + 2 damage to an Overt Threat

Items.Name: Black Hole Warhead
Items.Effect: Lose 9 Victory Points and Deal 4 damage to all Overt Threats

Items.Name: Counter Spell Creater
Items.Effect: Pay 1 [^Magic] and deal 7 damage to a Magical threat or 1 damage if you already used it this round and can be used as many times as you want

Items.Name: Weak Seeking Missle
Items.Effect: Kill the lowest remaining health Threat

Items.Name: Holy Protector
Items.Effect: Cannot be effected by any Threat effect. deal 3 unpreventable damage to any Threat

Items.Name: Hell Portal
Items.Effect: Lose 7 Victory Points and destroy a Threat

Items.Name: Demon Hunter
Items.Effect: Lose 2 [^Magic] and destroy a Magical Threat
Items.Flavor: He is really good at his job but his always saying he needs more equipment

Items.Name: Portal Gun
Items.Effect: One threat one of your inventions is hitting, is hit twice by the invention

Items.Name: Temporal Charm
Items.Effect: You may use another invention again this turn

Items.Name: Sacrificial Plume
Items.Effect: Lose 1 Scientist and Victory Points equal to the Wave, then deal 10 damage to a Threat

Items.Name: Orbital Laser
Items.Effect:
Gain a charge
OR
Lose a charge and deal 15 damage to a Threat

Items.Name: Incendary Rounds
Items.Effect:
Gain 5 ammo. 
Whenever you deal damage to a Threat remove a ammo and deal 1 addtional damage

Items.Name: Stun Gun
Items.Effect: Discard one threat in front of you

Items.Name: Sticky Grenade
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage to an Overt Threat and 2 damage to another Overt Threat

Items.Name: Robotic Soldiers
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to 2 different Overt Threats

Items.Name: Seek & Destroy Missles
Items.Effect: Lose 9 Victory Points and deal 6 damage to all Robotic Threats
Items.Flavor: The colateral damage is within acceptable margins

Items.Name: Gravity Gun
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to a threat and disable their text

Items.Name: EMP Bomb
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to all Robotic Threats

Items.Name: Recycler
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to a Threat. If this kills the Threat, gain 1 science of the type of the threat and gain 1 Victory Point

Items.Name: Power Transfer
Items.Effect: Target up to 4 Robotic Threats: Deal 2 damage to the first, 3 to the second, 4 to the third, and 5 to the forth

Items.Name: Laser Beam
Items.Effect: Expend a Scientist and deal 7 damage to a Threat

Items.Name: AI Hunter
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to a Robotic Threat and an additional 2 if it's Covert

Items.Name: Psycho Android
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage divided as you choose to Covert Threats, gain 1 additional Victory Point for each Threat killed this way

Items.Name: Giant Mech
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to all Overt Threats

Items.Name: Surveillance Network
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to all Covert Threats

Items.Name: Spider Mines
Items.Effect: Must be used as soon as possible. Deal 7 damage to the highest health Covert Threat

Items.Name: Internal Security AI
Items.Effect: Choose all but one Covert Threat to deal 4 damage to

Items.Name: Honey Pot Facility
Items.Effect: Expend a scientist and deal 9 damage to a Covert Threat

Items.Name: Sabotage Multitool
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to a Covert Threat

Items.Name: Automated Turrets
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to a Overt Threat

Items.Name: Cyber Virus
Items.Effect: Deal 6 damage to a Robotic Threat

Items.Name: Engineered Pathogen
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to all Biological Threats

Items.Name: Augmented Soldiers
Items.Effect: Deal 1 less damage, for each Overt Threat in front of you, then 7 damage to an Overt Threat

Items.Name: Poison Infused Weapons
Items.Effect: Take the negative victory points of a Threat and then double the damage on it

Items.Name: Giant Potion
Items.Effect: Another invention deals double damage to Overt Threats

Items.Name: Shapeshifting Implant
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to a Covert Threat

Items.Name: Pet Dragon
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to a Threat and gain 1 Victory Point if it died. Repeat this

Items.Name: Mind Control Device
Items.Effect: Once per game discard one Biological Threat and gain one action for this and all future turns

Items.Name: Pathogen Templet
Items.Effect: Pay 1 [^Genetics] and deal 8 damage to a Biological Threat

Items.Name: Spy Hunter
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage to a Covert Threat and an additional 3 if it's Biological

Items.Name: Covert Analyzer
Items.Effect: Target a Threat, you cannot damage the target, but at end of the turn gain 5 science of the type of the threat

Items.Name: Chemical Weapons
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage to an Overt Threat and an additional 3 if it is Biological

Items.Name: Enhanced Senses
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to 2 different Covert Threats

Items.Name: Reactive Poison
Items.Effect: One biological Threat takes 3 more damage from all sources for the turn

Items.Name: Deadly Parasite
Items.Effect: One Threat takes 1 more damage from all sources, if this threat dies, reuse this invention

Items.Name: Anti Alien Ventilation
Items.Effect: Deal 1 to all Covert Threats and an additional 3 if it is Biological
